column6: "CONFEDERACY OF DUNCES"   It might be The Punisher's final hour as DAREDEVIL, SPIDER-MAN, and WOLVERINE team up to bring Frank Castle's killing spree to an end. And what does the HULK have to do with it all?  A GARTH ENNIS TOUR DE FORCE! 32 PGS.MARVEL PSR+...$2.99
column8: | writer:Stan Lee | penciller:John McCrea | inker:Danny K. Miki
